lines.text: What foul luck. The controls are jammed and I'm stuck to this magnetic shield.
Curses. I've been double-crossed by my own devilish magnetic device.
I'm ready, Buzz. When do we strike?
[The alien spaceship has landed in the Lincoln Memorial]
Those flying fiends have landed right in the lap of Abraham Lincoln.
Wow. What a place for an enemy of the world to wind up.
Thunderation, men. We've been invaded by some Unidentified Fiendish Object.
Now let's see how destructive you are without your war weapons.
Frankenstein Jr., from now on the destiny of the whole world is in your hands.
Quickly, before it's too late. Press the Superhero button.
Uh-oh. Something's wrong at the Capitol. Suffering security, there's trouble afoot.
This calls for Super Suction Drawing Power.
